scripts.build: vite build && cp dist/index.html ../index.html && rm -rf ../viz/assets ../viz/data ../data ../docs/assets ../docs/data ../viz/public/viz && mkdir -p ../viz && cp -r dist/viz/assets ../viz/assets && cp -r dist/data ../viz/data && rm -rf dist && cd .. && echo 'Ensuring .nojekyll at repository root...' && touch .nojekyll
